name: CUBICA (itch)
description:
Creative 3D Cube Game

Rules:

  1. Start the game
  2. Click on the Box who say "Click Me!!!" to destroy it
  3. You need to combine three 'Same Color' Boxes to finish each level

Help:

  • You can carry the box to its destination with the help of moving objects
  • BEWARE! Don't destroy the moving box first, otherwise you will have to restart the level.
  • HAVE FUN!!

KNOWN BUG/s:

  • Sometimes, the click do not work (You need to to click at lower bottom end of the box, it works there pretty well)

I am looking to improve the game and more features in the future! 

(Tell me what you like to be added........ )

Feedback Form: https://forms.office.com/r/wvH1jLkkbA
It will take only less than a minute...
